description:
Dolce Shine EDP - 75ml - A Radiant Burst of Mediterranean Sunshine

Experience the captivating essence of Dolce & Gabbana Dolce Shine, a luminous floral fragrance that embodies Mediterranean beauty and joy. This 75ml Eau de Parfum bottle captures the essence of a sun-drenched Italian summer, bringing warmth and brightness to your fragrance collection. âœ¨

The Essence of Dolce Shine

Dolce Shine is a vibrant and fruity-floral fragrance that radiates positivity and energy. Created as part of the beloved Dolce & Gabbana collection, this women's fragrance offers a modern interpretation of femininity with its bright, optimistic character. Each spritz unveils a sensorial journey through sun-ripened fruits and delicate blossoms. ðŸŒ¸

Product Information
Size 75ml
Gender Women
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration EDP
Brand Dolce & Gabbana

A Symphony of Fruity Floral Notes

This bestselling fragrance unfolds in a harmonious blend of notes that capture the essence of Mediterranean sunshine:

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Juicy Mango, Bright Quince, Grapefruit
Heart Notes Jasmine, Transparent Flowers
Base Notes Blonde Woods, Australian Sandalwood, White Musk

Key Features of Dolce Shine EDP

  • ðŸ”¥ Vibrant and juicy mango opening that instantly captivates
  • ðŸ’« Moderate longevity perfect for daytime wear
  • ðŸŒ¿ Refreshing fruity-floral character ideal for spring and summer
  • ðŸ’Ž Signature elegant bottle with golden cap representing sunshine
  • âœ¨ Part of the prestigious Dolce & Gabbana fragrance collection

The Story Behind Dolce Shine

Launched in 2020, Dolce Shine represents the joyful spirit of Italian summers. It continues the legacy of the original Dolce fragrance, but with a brighter, more luminous character. The iconic bottle is adorned with a golden cap, symbolizing the Mediterranean sun that inspired this creation. As part of Dolce & Gabbana's celebrated fragrance line, Dolce Shine embodies the brand's commitment to capturing the essence of Italian beauty and joy.

Perfect For Every Occasion

Whether you're heading to the office, enjoying a casual weekend, or planning a new arrival in your collection, Dolce Shine EDP adapts beautifully to any setting. Its versatile character makes it an essential addition to your fragrance wardrobe.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Dolce Shine EDP last on skin?
Dolce Shine EDP offers moderate longevity of 4-6 hours on most skin types. For extended wear, apply to pulse points and layer with complementary body products from the Dolce & Gabbana collection. The fruity top notes will fade first, revealing a beautiful heart of jasmine and transparent flowers before settling into the warm base of blonde woods and musk.
